items.name: Men's Slim Fit T-Shirt
items.description: A stylish and comfortable slim fit T-shirt made from soft cotton, perfect for casual wear. Available in various colors.

items.name: Women's Floral Maxi Dress
items.description: A beautiful floral printed maxi dress, perfect for spring and summer occasions. Features a flowing silhouette and adjustable straps.

items.name: Unisex Hoodie
items.description: A cozy unisex hoodie with a soft fleece lining. It includes a front pocket and adjustable drawstrings, available in multiple sizes.

items.name: Men's Classic Blue Jeans
items.description: Classic blue jeans made from durable denim with a relaxed fit. Designed for comfort and versatility for everyday wear.

items.name: Women's High-Waisted Skirt
items.description: A chic high-waisted skirt that can be dressed up or down. The soft fabric and sleek cut make it perfect for any occasion.

items.name: Men's Leather Jacket
items.description: A premium leather jacket with a rugged, stylish look. Features include zipper details, multiple pockets, and a comfortable fit.

items.name: Women's Puffer Coat
items.description: A warm, insulated puffer coat designed for cold weather. Features a hood, a zippered front, and cozy pockets.

items.name: Men's Active Joggers
items.description: Sporty joggers made from breathable fabric, perfect for workouts or casual outings. The elastic waistband and cuffed ankles ensure a snug fit.

items.name: Women's Boho Cardigan
items.description: A stylish boho cardigan made from soft knit fabric, featuring fringe details and an open front design, perfect for layering over any outfit.

items.name: Men's Polo Shirt
items.description: A classic polo shirt made from breathable cotton fabric, perfect for casual and semi-formal occasions. Available in several colors.
